dc_title_s: 1859 Lamborn Map of the City of Trenton and Part of Hamilton Township, Mercer County, New Jersey
dc_description_s: An 1859 color map of Trenton and part of Hamilton Township. The map is bordered with 20 beautiful engravings of the city's prominent churches, factories, commercial businesses and homes of several of Trenton's distinguished residents of the time. See "Note" for list of engravings. Map scale: 1 inch = 400 ft.|List of engravings bordering map from top left corner and proceeding clockwise:|E.W.
